contents.text: Thank you for calling Fundbox in San Francisco, where we provide fast, flexible funds to grow your business.
For new funding inquiries and applications, please press 1.
To apply for a line of credit and explore financing options, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a funding specialist.

navigationGoals: I want to apply for a new business line of credit.
I need to apply for a line of credit to fund equipment purchases for my veteran-owned business.
Apply for a new $50K business line of credit with real-time approval
I need assistance applying for a line of credit for my business.
I want to apply for a line of credit to fund my upcoming research equipment purchase.

contents.text: To learn more about our financial services and eligibility criteria, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our product information team.

navigationGoals: I need to review Fundbox funding options and eligibility.
I want to learn if I qualify and what the terms are before starting a financing application.
Verify the APR structure and eligibility thresholds for Fundbox financing
I want to learn if I qualify for funding and what the requirements are.
I’d like to find out what financing options are available and whether I qualify as a graduate student.

contents.text: For account management and customer support, please press 2.
To check payment status and billing inquiries, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: I need to check my loan payment status.
I need to confirm my last payment went through and check when my next billing date is.
Confirm the ACH settlement status of my most recent invoice payment
I’d like to check my billing balance and the status of my recent payments.
I need to check my outstanding balance and next payment due date on my account.

contents.text: For technical assistance or general support, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our support team.

navigationGoals: I'm unable to access my Fundbox account online.
I need technical help logging into my account and updating my business contact information.
Troubleshoot the API integration between Fundbox and my accounting software
I’m having trouble logging into my account and need technical help.
I’m having trouble logging into my Fundbox portal and need help resetting my password.
